**Example 1: æ— **



Input: 

```
tccli dcdb ModifyDBInstanceName --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --InstanceId dcdbt-21dfpcv1 \
    --InstanceName test-name
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "InstanceId": "dcdbt-21dfpcv1",
        "RequestId": "9405c219-c89f-4557-9ada-881c72a9e9ea"

}
```
